text: Aleksandr Vladimirovich Rogozhkin (; 3 October 1949 â€“ 23 October 2021) was a Russian movie director and screenwriter. His career lasted from 1980 until 2012. His movie, Karaul, won the Alfred Bauer Prize at the 40th Berlin International Film Festival. His best known movie was the 2002 movie The Cuckoo (Kukushka). ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1949 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Russian movie directors Category:Russian screenwriters Category:People from Saint Petersburg
title: Aleksandr Rogozhkin
